cam72cam.mod.render

Class OpenGL

  • java.lang.Object
    • cam72cam.mod.render.OpenGL

  • public class OpenGL
extends java.lang.Object
    Optional, but recommended OpenGL helper library. Allows common GL operations to be safely wrapped in try blocks to prevent GFX bugs from early returns/exceptions
